info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:32PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Judith Basin and west central Fergus Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 632 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Hobson, or 18 miles west of Lewistown, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Hobson, Danvers and Moccasin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
